## Day 2 Task

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

## Finding derivative expression and slope

```{r}
# A
fx = expression(x ^ 2)

dfdx = D(fx, 'x')

x = 3

eval(dfdx)
```

```{r}
# B 
Pa = expression(2 * (3 * a + 2) ^ 4 - 5)

dPda = D(Pa, 'a')

a = 1.2

eval(dPda)
```

## Another penguin plot

```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, 
       aes(x = bill_length_mm, 
           y = bill_depth_mm, 
           color = species)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  theme_minimal()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = species, y = flipper_length_mm)) + geom_jitter() + labs(x = "Species", y = "Flipper Length (mm)", title = "Penguin Species Flipper Length")
```
